attributes.action: ask the Welsh Assembley and First Minister for Wales to revise Planning Guidance TAN 8 so as to narrow the area where additional windfarms can be developed in communities where there are current windfarm developments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh Assembley has issued TAN 8 Planning Guidance on Renewable Energy and has designated the North Denbighshire Moors as a Strategic Search area where future windfarm development may be possible. Residents are very concerned about the intensification of windfarm development in the Nantglyn area and wish to see TAN 8 amended or a specific intervention by the Prime Minister / First Minister for Wales to prevent further windfarm development in this area
